body_html:
Ah, I was so stupid. This fixes the problem!

For those careless guys who might meet the same problem in the future, I observed the original error message when my android_ndk_repository is defined like this:

android_ndk_repository(
  name="androidndk",
  path="/usr/local/Cellar/android-ndk/r14b/",
  api_level=14)

I didn't check anything and I thought that integer value in r%db should match the value of api_level. So while using r12b and r13b I've basically changed api_level to 12 and 13, respectively.

This is not the case, it is specified here in the bazel repository that "Similarly, for the android_ndk_repository rule, the value of the api_level attribute corresponds to a directory containing the NDK libraries for that API level."

This config now builds successfully:

android_ndk_repository(
  name="androidndk",
  path="/usr/local/Cellar/android-ndk/r12b/",
  api_level=14)

This is not the case, it is specified here in the bazel repository that "Similarly, for the android_ndk_repository rule, the value of the api_level attribute corresponds to a directory containing the NDK libraries for that API level."
This config now builds successfully:

  api_level=14)
body:
Ah, I was so stupid. This fixes the problem!

For those careless guys who might meet the same problem in the future, I observed the original error message when my `android_ndk_repository` is defined like this:

```
android_ndk_repository(
  name="androidndk",
  path="/usr/local/Cellar/android-ndk/r14b/",
  api_level=14)
```

I didn't check anything and I thought that integer value in `r%db` should match the value of `api_level`. So while using `r12b` and `r13b` I've basically changed `api_level` to 12 and 13, respectively.

This is not the case, it is specified [here](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/tree/master/examples/android) in the bazel repository that "Similarly, for the `android_ndk_repository` rule, the value of the `api_level` attribute corresponds to a directory containing the NDK libraries for that API level."

This config now builds successfully:

```
android_ndk_repository(
  name="androidndk",
  path="/usr/local/Cellar/android-ndk/r12b/",
  api_level=14)
```
